bioghist.p: Donald Ker of Ker & Downey Safaris (established 1946) was the second hunter on the Academy of Natural Sciences' 1934 expedition (safari) conducted by Baron von Blixen.

scopecontent.p: Transcription of notes and diary entries written by Donald Ker on the George Vanderbilt African Expedition in 1934 and on the William K. Carpenter African Expedition in 1947-1948. The collection also includes a photocopy of a letter from Ker to H.T. Green.

accessrestrict.p: The collection is open for research.

relatedmaterial.p: Related material may be found in the following collections: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia: Academy of Natural Sciences of Philadelphia expeditions records.
